questions: - Can Tracardi be connected to an existing Elasticsearch instance?
- How can Tracardi be connected to an existing Elasticsearch instance?
- Is there documentation available for connecting Tracardi to Elasticsearch via SSL?
answer:
# Can I use Tracardi with an existing Elasticsearch instance?
- Yes, you can connect Tracardi to an existing Elasticsearch instance. Documentation is available for connecting
  Tracardi to Elasticsearch via SSL.
